p.span: Per the North Carolina Governor's Executive Order No. 121, Clinton City Schools is closed for students through May 15, 2020 unless extended beyond that date.

br.a: Parent Resources from the Poe Center

span.span: By 2025, Clinton City Schools will be the premier learning community in the Southeast- improving the world one Dark Horse at a time.
Our mission is to educate all students to their highest level of academic performance and to prepare them to become productive members of society.
